EmailTemplate.name: MC-202205-HHS-ENT-EM-Stroke-Month-Campaign.Email 1 - Providence
EmailTemplate.subject: System-wide telestroke network improves clinical outcomes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
May is National Stroke Awareness Month
Image Doctor looking at brain scan
Today nearly 1400 hospitals across the U.S. rely on Teladoc Health virtual care technology to provide life-saving stroke care. In recognition of National Stroke Awareness Month, we’re sharing how our industry-leading telestroke solution is improving clinical outcomes for our clients.
For example, Providence St. Joseph Health has been providing regional telestroke services for over 10 years through a system-wide network powered by Teladoc Health. Learn how the organization expanded this solution to overcome growing demand for services and achieve better clinical outcomes and lower costs.
Read the case study <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/developing-a-system-wide-telestroke-network/?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=banner&utm_campaign=social-media-library&utm_content=sales-tile]]>
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
